spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Kallazandra is a 15th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following sorcerer spells prepared:

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: Kallazandra can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Sorcery Points
entries: The Kallazandra has 12 sorcery points. It can spend 1 or more sorcery points as a bonus action to gain one of the following benefits:

Heightened Spell: When the Kallazandra casts a spell that forces a creature to make a saving throw to resist the spell's effects, the Kallazandra can spend 3 sorcery points to give one target of the spell disadvantage on its first saving throw against the spell.
Quickened Spell: When the Kallazandra casts a spell that has a casting time of 1 action, the Kallazandra can spend 2 sorcery points to change the casting time to 1 bonus action for this casting.

trait.name: Tentacles of the Deep (3/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, you create a 10-foot-long tentacle at a point you can see within 60 feet of you. When you create the tentacle, you can make a melee spell attack against one creature within 10 feet of it. As a bonus action on your turn, you can move the tentacle up to 30 feet and repeat the attack.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
entries: If the Kallazandra fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage, or 3 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands, plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Tentacle (Tentacles of the Deep)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) cold damage, and its speed is reduced by 10 feet until the start of your next turn.

bonus.name: Stormy Retreat
entries: Swirling blasts of elemental air briefly surround you immediately before or after casting a spell of 1st level or higher. This allows you to fly up to 15 feet without provoking attacks of opportunity.

legendary.name: Cast Lesser Spell
entries: Kallazandra casts a spell of 2rd level or lower.

reaction.name: Protection from the Deeps
entries: When you or a creature you c
an see takes damage while within 10 feet of the tentacle, you can use your reaction to choose one of those creatures and reduce the damage to that creature by {@dice 1d8}.
